gw.api.name

Class NameFormatter

  • gw.api.name.NameFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class NameFormatter
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        IntrinsicType

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NameFormatter()
      The name formatter is built to abstract out name display for internationalization. When name columns are changed, this formatter and its usages (which may omit certain fields) should be updated accordingly.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Format a name as text, including all fields.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NameFormatter

        NameFormatter()
        The name formatter is built to abstract out name display for internationalization. When name columns are changed, this formatter and its usages (which may omit certain fields) should be updated accordingly.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        String format(ContactNameFields name,
            String delimiter)
        Format a name as text, including all fields.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to format.
        delimiter - The delimiter used to separate "lines" of the name. Typical settings are " " and "".
        Returns:

      • format

        String format(ContactNameFields name,
            String delimiter,
            Set<NameOwnerFieldId> fields)
        Format a name as text.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to format.
        delimiter - The delimiter used to separate "lines" of the name. Typical settings are " " and "".
        fields - The set of fields to include in the name.
        Returns:

      • format

        String format(NameOwner nameOwner,
            String delimiter)
        Format a name as text.
        Parameters:
        nameOwner - The nameOwner that specifies name values and what fields to include in the name.
        delimiter - The delimiter used to separate "lines" of the name. Typical settings are " " and "".
        Returns:
